sect1.title: Installation of KDE PIM

para.screen: Estimated build disk space: 50 MB Estimated installed space: 7 MB Package size: &kde-pim-size; Estimated build time: 22 min (667 MHz)

sect1.para: The kpilot application depends on pilot-link version 0.9.5 which can be found at
Install kdepim with: ./configure --prefix=&kde-dir; --enable-objprelink \ --disable-debug --disable-dependency-tracking && make && make install
